name: part_004
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ1stソロライブ】常闇トワ 1stソロライブ ＂Break your ×××＂【無料チラ見せ】 [WlSJEyV6Emw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A high-energy visual montage showcasing the 'Break your xxx' concert logo surrounded by a rapidly changing collection of fan-submitted names and thematic phrases.
Information slides promoting various concert merchandise, including the 'Support Set' and order-made items like T-shirts and penlights.
A view of the live concert venue where the large stage screen displays the event logo and audience 'Attention' regulations before the start of the show.

subtitles.original: Break your xxx 応援セット
